entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain this evening then to a few flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
